system.usedWith: Bolt: Legion Bolt Pistols, Bolters, and Combi-Bolters
system.damageOrEffect: Loses Tearing, gains Warp Weapon and Blast(2) Qualities. Only functions when used is dedicated to Tzeentch. Can only fire on Single Shot mode. Warp Weapon Quality only applies to Living Targets. Heretical.
